POLICY DETAILS: "Meridian requires a full 90 day audit trail for the Borrowers sources of down payment. For those gifted by a donor
column4: we require a statement confirming the availability of the funds. The donor must be an immediate family member (defined as Mother
column11: or Legal Dependent). In addition to down payment confirmation
column12: 1.5% closing costs are to be confirmed for all high ratio and conventional purchases."

column4: unless already fully affixed to the land and 100% of services in place."
